summary: Provides utilities to load, filter, and preprocess image‑text data for Stable Diffusion training, including synthetic dataset handling, resolution‑based cropping, augmentation pipelines, and integration with WebDataset shards and pre‑computed CLIP embeddings, supporting both standard and SDXL configurations.
business_intent: Facilitates scalable preparation of multimodal training data for generative diffusion models, accelerating research and product development in AI image generation.
